pain_points_original.title: Mandatory PROTECTED-Level Security and Sovereignty
pain_points_original.description: The solution must meet non-negotiable Australian government security standards, including IRAP certification at a PROTECTED level and strict onshore data sovereignty. As the government's central legal provider handling sensitive data, a security or sovereignty failure poses a catastrophic national risk.

pain_points_original.title: Need for Explainable and Advanced 'Agentic' AI
pain_points_original.description: AGS requires AI that is ethical, explainable, and transparent, moving beyond standard generative AI to 'agentic' systems for complex tasks. 'Black box' AI presents an unacceptable legal and reputational risk for government work, making model trustworthiness and advanced capability a critical need.

pain_points_original.title: Requirement for Australian Legal Context
pain_points_original.description: Generic AI models are insufficient. The tool must be specifically designed for and trained on Australian law to ensure accuracy and relevance. Providing incorrect or contextually unaware legal outputs is a fundamental risk for the government's top legal service provider, making this a critical need.

pain_points_original.title: Low Productivity Across Core Legal Workflows
pain_points_original.description: Current legal workflows across 570 lawyers are highly manual and time-intensive. AGS needs to automate and accelerate core tasks like drafting, summarization, and discovery, as detailed in numerous use cases. This is crucial for boosting efficiency, increasing capacity, and freeing up legal experts.

pain_points_original.title: Seamless Integration with Critical Existing Systems
pain_points_original.description: The AI tool must supplement, not replace, core systems like iManage Cloud and Elite 3E. A standalone solution would disrupt established workflows for 800 staff and create data silos, undermining adoption and ROI. Seamless integration is a critical prerequisite for success and to avoid business disruption.

merge_decisions.merged: Need for Explainable and Advanced 'Agentic' AI
